value_i18n.en_US: Become a Liferay master with guided content created by Liferay experts.

definition.name: Content Container

value_i18n.en_US: Learn at your own pace with self-directed courses that guide you through specific topics in-depth.
Use Liferay DXP's low-code and user-friendly tools to build an engaging and scalable enterprise website. Bridge theory and practice by crafting a marketing website for a fictional company.
Learn how to succeed in the sales process, from generating prospects to closing deals and working with Liferay’s contracts.
Receive an introduction to Liferay the company, its products, and how to compete in the competitive landscape.
Take a structured learning path tailored to your role and experience level, ensuring you gain the Liferay skills you need.
Receive an introduction to Liferay the company, its products, and how to compete in the competitive landscape.
Learn how to succeed in the sales process, from generating prospects to closing deals and working with Liferay’s contracts.
Craft compelling 30-minute Liferay demos tailored to client needs. This course equips Sales Engineers to conduct impactful demos, showcase Liferay's potential, and discuss successful deployments.
Validate your expertise and showcase your skills with official Liferay certifications. Explore available certifications and find out how to earn them.
